page.para: One day Ja/dav found a place be/side the sea, with no trees.
Ja/dav de/cid/ed to grow lots of trees be/side the sea.
Ja/dav plant/ed more and more trees. With time they be/came a for/est.
Many in/sects came to the for/est be/side the sea.
Af/ter the in/sects, lots of birds came to the for/est.
Af/ter the birds, many wild an/i/mals came to the for/est.
Now Ja/dav is ver/y hap/py in his won/der/ful for/est.
